column5: Hey everyone,  I am looking for a beagle/basset hound cross dog. Age is not really a concern. My mothers dog died a while ago and she is insistant on getting another beagle/basset hound cross dog.  Any help would be appreciated.  Thanks Bryan

Both Moose and I bought beagle pups in September from ray's beagles just outside of Port Perry. Not exactly what you're loking for but thought I'd give you a reply. These are hunting dogs - high activity and very head strong but he does have pups that are more suited for couch dogs.  Very affordable for a breeder of beagles. My pup is on the left.
if you want them cross trying pulling on their tails

You can try this place http://www.bassetrescue.ca/.  We have dealt with them before and they were very good about things.  We fostered a cross you are looking for as well.  All dogs range in age as well.
Thanks guys for your replies. Keep the suggestions coming if you could.  Talk to ya.  Bryan
